SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class AccountPositionGroupSummaryReport

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityCashaccountGroupByCurrencyBaseReport
grafioschtrader.reports.AccountPositionGroupSummaryReport
@Component public class AccountPositionGroupSummaryReport extends SecurityCashaccountGroupByCurrencyBaseReport
Comprehensive financial reporting service that generates combined position summaries for cash accounts and security accounts across portfolios. Provides consolidated views of portfolio holdings with multi-currency support and intelligent exchange rate handling.

This report generator is the primary tool for creating portfolio position reports that combine cash balances, security holdings, realized and unrealized gains/losses, and foreign exchange impacts. It supports both tenant-wide and individual portfolio reporting with flexible grouping capabilities.

Key Features:

  • Multi-currency portfolio position calculations with automated exchange rate resolution
  • Combined cash account and security account reporting
  • Realized and unrealized gain/loss calculations
  • Foreign exchange gain/loss tracking for multi-currency positions
  • Flexible grouping by currency, portfolio, or custom criteria
  • Historical and current market value reporting
  • Dividend, interest, and fee tracking with tax considerations

Report Types:

  • Tenant-wide grand summary across all portfolios
  • Individual portfolio position summary
  • Currency-grouped position summaries
  • Security account and cash account breakdowns

The service handles scenarios including margin trading, currency conversions, stock splits, dividend distributions, and inter-account transfers while maintaining accurate accounting principles and audit trails.

  • Method Details

    • getAccountGrandSummaryIdTenant

      public AccountPositionGrandSummary getAccountGrandSummaryIdTenant(Integer idTenant, AccountGroupMap<?> grouping, Date untilDate)
      Generates a comprehensive position summary for all portfolios within a tenant, grouped according to the specified criteria (e.g., by currency, asset class, or portfolio). Provides a consolidated view of the tenant's entire investment portfolio with multi-currency normalization to the tenant's main currency.

      This method asynchronously loads historical exchange rates and currency pairs to ensure accurate multi-currency calculations. It processes all transactions across all portfolios up to the specified date and calculates current market values, realized/unrealized gains, and foreign exchange impacts.

      Parameters:
      idTenant - the unique identifier of the tenant
      grouping - the grouping strategy for organizing results (currency, portfolio, etc.)
      untilDate - the cut-off date for including transactions and valuations
      Returns:
      comprehensive grand summary containing all portfolio positions grouped as specified

    • getAccountGrandSummaryPortfolio

      public AccountPositionGroupSummary getAccountGrandSummaryPortfolio(Integer idTenant, Integer idPortfolio, Date untilDate)
      Calculates and returns a detailed position summary for a single portfolio, including all cash accounts and security positions with current market valuations. Validates tenant ownership before processing to ensure data security.

      This method provides a comprehensive view of a single portfolio's holdings, including cash balances, security positions, unrealized gains/losses, and foreign exchange impacts. It handles portfolios with multiple currencies and normalizes all values to the portfolio's base currency.

      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID for security validation
      idPortfolio - the unique identifier of the portfolio to analyze
      untilDate - the cut-off date for transactions and market valuations
      Returns:
      detailed position summary for the specified portfolio
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the portfolio doesn't belong to the specified tenant
